data.title: Livery Company Prizes
data.meta_description: The Livery Company Prizes honour outstanding achievements from students or tutors who have taken or taught City & Guilds qualifications.
data.text:
Recognising and rewarding exceptional learners or tutors who have achieved excellence in their field.

About the

Prizes

Latest

News

Make a

Nomination

3

Introduction

The Livery Company Prizes honour outstanding achievements from students or tutors who have taken or taught City & Guilds qualifications in the trade of a Livery Company and are presented through The City & Guilds of London Institute.

Each year several City of London Livery Companies award prizes to individuals they feel have excelled in their field. The City and Guilds of London Institute was founded by the Livery Companies in 1878 and therefore maintains a close link with them.

I was surprised to have won – it’s been an amazing experience and I am very grateful to City & Guilds and the Worshipful Company of Needlemakers for the award.

Kian Davis

Make a nomination

Celebrate a learner or tutor who excels in their field.

You will need to complete a short form providing your details, as well as information about the nominee including the qualification they have completed and a summary of why they deserve to be recognised.

The prizes will be presented in March 2024 in London and we are accepting nominations for:

Catering/Cookery

Construction/Building incl Distribution & Supply

Electrical Engineering

Engineering: Technical/Maintenance/Operations

Fashion & Textiles

Health & Social Care

Horticulture

Joinery, Furniture/Carpentry

Stitched Textiles/Embroidery

Start your

Nomination
